level.heading: Trade dress requirements for private vehicles-for-hire.
level.text: A private vehicle-for-hire shall display a consistent and distinctive trade dress consisting of a logo, insignia, or emblem at all times while the operator is logged into the private vehicle-for-hire company’s digital dispatch. The trade dress shall be:
Sufficiently large and color contrasted so as to be readable during daylight hours at a distance of at least 50 feet; and
Reflective, illuminated, or otherwise patently visible in darkness.

level.heading: Legislative history of Law 20-197
level.text: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-197: Section 7 of D.C. Law 20-197 provided, in part, that §§ 1, 2, 3, and 4 of the act shall apply as of March 10, 2015.
